name: Animal Kostume
description:
Animal Kostume is a hardcore 2D platformer where you take the position of kroc-boy, a dude dressed up in a crocodile suit who must overcome ten levels packed with enemies in order to finish his turn in the Animal Kostume night. Expect a lot of tries to finish this challenging adventure and find out a bit more about the future of the Animal Kostume group!

> Main features:
- 10 levels with increasing difficulty;
- Drop-items (surprises) that might either boost your number and quantity of bullets or health;
- Retro/old school style;
- Double jump;
- Short game but with very high difficulty;
- Two types of guns: normal rifle and rpg;
- HP system and no continues.
